StanGher ideas

The goal of StanGher is to create new good ideas and projects around the world for pleasant communication, meetings, work and expirience sharing beetwen interesting people in interesting places.


We are fully open for ideas and exicited for new guests in our community!

About projects

Our projects are design to be pleasant and get as much comfort as posible for average or expirienced travellers. Our spaces are perfect for meetings, teamwork, recreation and tourism. In our places you will find it convenient to work, meet new people, and spend your time with pleasure.

Travel and explore

Discover new places and meet new people! We whant you to check out new opportunities of different places. Our projects helps to get as much comfort for travelling and explore events.

Work and share

Our projects is the best place to work and meet new people. We give to our guests a pleasant time to improve their work.

Live and relax

Our projects are designed for maximum comfort for our guests. you will always be comfortable to spend time with us.

Our projects

StanGher
Coworking @ Moscow (Riverdale), Russia

Best replacement for boring and cramped offices

Here you can get useful contacts, exchange professional experience, find excellent opportunities for cooperation, and also enjoy your work time pleasantly and productively.

Learn more
StanGher
Apartments @ Moscow (Riverdale), Russia

Stylish and comfortable apartments in business center Riverdale

We offer you to stay in a comfortable loft apartment and feel at home while being away on a business trip to Moscow.

Learn more
StanGher
Apartments @ Moscow (The Loft Club), Russia

Loft apartment for rent and sale at “The Loft Club”

Our lofts has a comfortable and pleasant atmosphere in a stylish complex with architecture in the spirit of the classic lofts of New York in the middle of the last century of English art blocks.
